Detailed Description

The menu for the C4DView and handlers for menu events.

This class has been outsourced from C4DView to keep C4DView to a managable size.

Author:
Helge Preuss <scout@hyperspace-travel.de>

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

C4DView::Menu4D::Menu4D ( C4DView *  _parent  ) 

Creates the application's main menu and all its submenus.

This Constructor is where the menu structure is defined; if you want to change the menu, do it here.

Basically this happens by inserting all the menu items and the QActions they trigger manually. The application of TemplatedRealFunctionFactory<Function> as Factory object helps to save a lot of redundant code, but still every menu item must be specified manually.

References about(), animation, AnimationSettings(), appear, Benchmark(), Colors(), Coordinates(), customComplexFunction(), customFunction(), customPolarFunction(), customSurface(), fcc, Fog(), fr3r, functions, getAction(), C4DView::getColors(), C4DView::getDisplayCoordinates(), C4DView::getDisplayPolygons(), C4DView::getFog(), C4DView::getLight(), C4DView::getRenderToPixmap(), C4DView::getShade(), C4DView::getTransparent(), Help(), help, HyperFog(), insertAction(), Loki::SingletonHolder< T, CreationPolicy >::Instance(), Light(), m_parent, ObjectGasket(), ObjectHypercube(), ObjectHyperpyramid(), ObjectHypersponge(), objects, RenderToImages(), setBackground(), C4DView::setWireframe(), Shade(), surfaces, Transparent(), and Wireframe().

QAction * C4DView::Menu4D::insertAction ( QMenu *  _menu,
const QString &  title,
const char *  slot,
bool  checkable = true 
) [private]

insert a menu item with a specified slot into a specified menu

Insert a menu item with a specified slot into a specified menu and into the hash map storing the actions by menu title. This is necessary to find the menus whenever you want to change the item titles.

Parameters:
_menu the menu you want to add the item to
title the title of the item
slot the function triggered by the item's selection
checkable whether the menu item is checkable

References menuMap.

Referenced by Menu4D().

Here is the caller graph for this function:

QAction * C4DView::Menu4D::insertAction ( QMenu *  _menu,
const QString &  title,
RealFunctionFactory *  factory,
bool  checkable = true 
) [private]

insert a menu item creating a RealFunction object into a specified menu

This version is called whenever a new RealFunction should be initialized and displayed in C4DView

Parameters:
_menu the menu you want to add the item to
title the title of the item
factory the factory object creating the desired RealFunction object
checkable whether the menu item is checkable

References fr3r, m_parent, and menuMap.
